import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const NewsList = () => { const [News, SetNews] = useState([]) const [failedToFetch, setFailedToFetch] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:4000/api/news/news_list') .then(data => { SetNews(data) setFailedToFetch(false) }) .catch(err => { console.error(err) setFailedToFetch(false) }) }, []) return (

) } export default NewsList
